about_the_game:
Transform Your Screen with Vibrant Colors

Acidic Pro gives a fresh look to your games, applications, and desktop! Great for those looking to spice up their gaming experience, or for artistic users who may want to try different hues and themes. ColorShifts, or basic colors such as red, blue, inverse, and more are available.

Experience Vibrant ColorShift

With Colorshift you can effortlessly cycle through a diverse range of captivating colors! Say goodbye to monotonous screens and embrace the dynamic atmosphere created by the ever-changing hues. Whether you seek a tranquil ambiance or a burst of energy, ColorShift will elevate your screen experience to new heights.


Full Hue Control of your Desktop

Acidic Pro works on top of your games, applications, and desktop, giving full and easy color control! Try out your favorite games with a different color twist, or change your work environment with a cooler relaxing tone. Built in Colors, Custom Colors, or Color multiplication can be used to find that perfect hue!


Half Screen or Diagonal Screen for Contrast

Acidic Pro allows you to split your screen into two halves, each with independent color settings. Customize each side to your liking, whether you desire complementary tones or a bold contrast. The possibilities are endless, and you're in complete command of your visual environment.




Give your desktop experience a colorful upgrade with Acidic Pro!


Photosensitive Warning: Read Before Playing!
A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a computer screen, or while playing video games, may induce an epileptic seizure in these individuals. Certain conditions may induce previously undetected epileptic symptoms even in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy.

name: Acidic Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Introducing Acidic Pro! Revolutionize your screen with vibrant colors and hues. Experience advanced ColorShift, split-screen, and a user-friendly interface. Express your style, enhance your visual experience, and download now to elevate your digital world.
